Name: [Revelation/Execution] Sneaky Sniping VI
Desc:
[Revelation/Execution Skill]
Shoots at enemies with arrows condensed with evil energy. Hold down the key and continue aiming at enemies to increase attack range. Release the key to deal a fatal blow to the enemies by penetrating them with a giant arrows. [Revelation/Execution] Sneaky Sniping resets Shadow Step's cooldown when defeating an enemy.
Required Skill: Sneaky Sniping Lv. 1 or higher

HFields.h1:
MP Cost: 410. Key down for up to 1.6 sec. Generates impact 5 times that attacks up to 12 enemies at 548% Damage 12 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec.
